Token.Abstract: Set up the Bridge SDK for the given study and pointing at the production environment. Usually you would call this at the beginning of your AppDelegate's application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions: method.

Parameter.Name: study
Parameter.Abstract: A string identifier for your app's Bridge study, assigned to you by Sage Bionetworks.

Parameter.Name: cacheDaysAhead
Parameter.Abstract: Number of days ahead to cache.

Parameter.Name: cacheDaysBehind
Parameter.Abstract: Number of days behind to cache.

Token.Abstract: Convenience method for setting up the study with default caching for days ahead and days behind.

Parameter.Name: study
Parameter.Abstract: A string identifier for your app's Bridge study, assigned to you by Sage Bionetworks.

Parameter.Name: useCache
Parameter.Abstract: A flag indicating whether to use the SDK's built-in persistent caching. Pass NO if you want to handle this yourself.

Token.Abstract: Convenience method for setting up the study with caching turned off (default).

Set up the Bridge SDK for the given study and server environment. Usually you would only call this version of the method from test suites, or if you have a non-DEBUG build configuration that you don't want running against the production server environment. Otherwise call the version of the setupWithStudy: method that doesn't take an environment parameter, and let the SDK use the default environment.

Parameter.Name: study
Parameter.Abstract: A string identifier for your app's Bridge study, assigned to you by Sage Bionetworks.

Parameter.Name: cacheDaysAhead
Parameter.Abstract: Number of days ahead to cache.

Parameter.Name: cacheDaysBehind
Parameter.Abstract: Number of days behind to cache.

Parameter.Name: environment
Parameter.Abstract: Which server environment to run against.

Token.Abstract: For backward compatibility only. Use setupWithStudy:cacheDaysAhead:cacheDaysBehind:environment: instead (which this method calls).
For backward compatibility only. Use setupWithStudy:cacheDaysAhead:cacheDaysBehind:environment: instead (which this method calls).
For backward compatibility only. Use setupWithStudy: instead (which this method calls).
For backward compatibility only. Use setupWithStudy:cacheDaysAhead:cacheDaysBehind:environment: instead (which this method calls).
